name: MDLVertexFormat
desc: Descriptions of the data size and layout for a vertex attribute, used by the format property.

items.name: case invalid
items.desc: The vertex attribute has just been initialized or its format is unknown.

items.name: case packedBit
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes in packed vector formats.

items.name: case uCharBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 8-bit unsigned integer format.

items.name: case charBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 8-bit signed integer format.

items.name: case uCharNormalizedBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 8-bit unsigned normalized integer format.

items.name: case charNormalizedBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 8-bit signed normalized integer format.

items.name: case uShortBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 16-bit unsigned integer format.

items.name: case shortBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 16-bit signed integer format.

items.name: case uShortNormalizedBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 16-bit unsigned normalized integer format.

items.name: case shortNormalizedBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 16-bit signed normalized integer format.

items.name: case uIntBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

items.name: case intBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 32-bit signed integer format.

items.name: case halfBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 16-bit floating-point format.

items.name: case floatBits
items.desc: A bit mask for vertex attributes whose components are in 32-bit floating-point format.

items.name: case uChar
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a scalar of unsigned 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case uChar2
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each of unsigned 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case uChar3
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each of unsigned 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case uChar4
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each of unsigned 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case char
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a scalar of signed 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case char2
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each of signed 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case char3
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each of signed 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case char4
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each of signed 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case uCharNormalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a normalized scalar of unsigned 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case uChar2Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each with a normalized value of unsigned 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case uChar3Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each with a normalized value of unsigned 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case uChar4Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each with a normalized value of unsigned 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case charNormalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a normalized scalar of signed 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case char2Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each with a normalized value of signed 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case char3Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each with a normalized value of signed 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case char4Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each with a normalized value of signed 8-bit integer type.

items.name: case uShort
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a scalar of unsigned 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case uShort2
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each of unsigned 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case uShort3
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each of unsigned 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case uShort4
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each of unsigned 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case short
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a scalar of signed 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case short2
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each of signed 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case short3
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each of signed 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case short4
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each of signed 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case uShortNormalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a normalized scalar of unsigned 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case uShort2Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each with a normalized value of unsigned 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case uShort3Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each with a normalized value of unsigned 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case uShort4Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each with a normalized value of unsigned 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case shortNormalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a normalized scalar of signed 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case short2Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each with a normalized value of signed 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case short3Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each with a normalized value of signed 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case short4Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each with a normalized value of signed 16-bit integer type.

items.name: case uInt
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a scalar of unsigned 32-bit integer type.

items.name: case uInt2
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each of unsigned 32-bit integer type.

items.name: case uInt3
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each of unsigned 32-bit integer type.

items.name: case uInt4
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each of unsigned 32-bit integer type.

items.name: case int
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a scalar of signed 32-bit integer type.

items.name: case int2
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each of signed 32-bit integer type.

items.name: case int3
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each of signed 32-bit integer type.

items.name: case int4
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each of signed 32-bit integer type.

items.name: case half
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a scalar of 16-bit floating-point type.

items.name: case half2
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each of 16-bit floating-point type.

items.name: case half3
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each of 16-bit floating-point type.

items.name: case half4
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each of 16-bit floating-point type.

items.name: case float
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a scalar of 32-bit floating-point type.

items.name: case float2
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 2 components, each of 32-bit floating-point type.

items.name: case float3
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 3 components, each of 32-bit floating-point type.

items.name: case float4
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a vector with 4 components, each of 32-bit floating-point type.

items.name: case int1010102Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a packed vector with 4 components of signed integer type. The first three components are 10 bits each, and the fourth component is 2 bits.

items.name: case uInt1010102Normalized
items.desc: The attribute value for each vertex is a packed vector with 4 components of unsigned integer type. The first three components are 10 bits each, and the fourth component is 2 bits.
